Good Comments: Wtf is this shit. Try to actually read opening lyrics, get a GOOD readable font. Oh, and for the love of God, WHY DID THE KARAOKE HAVE TO BE SO HUGE?! This is crap.
They cannot read Japanese. The karaoke lyrics are on the damn screen and they can't romanize it correctly. How they manage to translate anything is beyond me.
When no one in the group can read hiragana, you know you're in for some mediocrity.
REALLY bad quality subs even when they're taking so long. No reason to wait for their releases.
Bad Comments: Good, but I wish they'd also release a lower quality version, cause >200 MB/episode for such a long anime takes too much storage room... I mean Dragon Ball is hardly an anime that points with graphics anyway. :P
They are not only slow, but their subs have some mistakes. Also, they use japanese words in subs.
Huge ugly karaoke, ugly font, can't even get the romanji in the OP right WHEN IT'S WRITTEN IN KANA BELOW THE EPISODE. Shit sucks.
